remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含有关在绑定过程中发生的异常或错误的信息。The contains information regarding exceptions or errors that occurred during a binding process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates handling the event. 若要运行此代码，请将其粘贴到空代码文件中。To run this code, paste it into an empty code file. remarks.format: ## Remarks `state` 指示绑定过程是成功还是出现错误或异常。`state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred. `context` 指示在更新绑定控件或数据源时是否发生了错误。`context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还可能与 继承自的类的或的事件关联 。The might also be associated with the event of a or of a class that inherits from . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件，并使用 来确保在更改某个控件值时，绑定到同一个数据源的多个控件保持同步。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and use the to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并 `InitializeControlsAndData` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/CS/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 确定绑定是否成功，或是否出现错误或异常。Use the to determine if the binding was successful, or an error or exception occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `Binding1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Binding1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#77](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#77)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#77](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#77)]

summary.span: 获取绑定操作过程中发生的错误的文本说明。

span.span: Gets the text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.

value.span: 绑定操作过程中发生的错误的文本说明。

span.span: The text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果绑定操作中未出现错误，则此属性返回空字符串。This property returns an empty string if no error occurred in the binding operation. 当发生异常时，它将返回属性的值 。It returns the value of the property when an exception occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `Binding1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Binding1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#77](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#77)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#77](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#77)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `null`如果在绑定操作过程中未发生异常，则此属性返回。This property returns `null` if an exception did not occur during the binding operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件，并使用 来确保在更改某个控件值时，绑定到同一个数据源的多个控件保持同步。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and use the to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并 `InitializeControlsAndData` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method.
